Sentence.sentence: The hope is that the success of COP 21 opens the door to future international agreement on carbon prices.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Most people would love to get students from more underserved populations, but they just can't get them in the door.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And while you may forgive your smartphone an occasional fault, you probably  have less patience for error messages from your door lock.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Cialdini conducted a study in San Diego in which coat hangers bearing messages about saving energy were hung on people's doors.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Also we have our own studio next door where reproduce albums for up and coming artists.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: That is, the new offerings companies are pushing out the door every six months or so are me-too products or ones with just a couple of new features.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: To her, it meant moving confidently around the court room, using convincing body language, and projecting her voice so it could be heard from the judge's bench to the back door.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都有"门"的意思。
means: gate ： 指校园、公园、工厂、城市或庭院等的大门，通常有墙无顶。
door ： 指建筑物的大门或房间的门，一般有墙有顶，也指车辆等的门。

Sentence.sentence: Children of keepers remember inspectors wearing white gloves to run their fingers over door frames and windowsills looking for dust.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Dad carried the pot out and we opened doors and windows to air out the house.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Diners at bad tables — next to the kitchen door, say — spent nearly as much as others but soon fled.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Excuse yourself and let the person know you're busy so they can get the hint than when the door is closed, you're not to be disturbed.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Finally, when we came to the next stop, the boy ran up to the door of the bus.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: He finds that if babies aged 18 months see an unrelated adult with hands full trying to open a door, almost all will immediately try to help.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: He should replace the door lock.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 选项

Sentence.sentence: I live next door to a couple whose children often make a lot of noise.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 单项选择 原文

Sentence.sentence: I pushed her toward the front door, waving at the family, saying, sorry, please forgive us, you have a really nice place.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: If the inspector had opened the oven door, he would have seen a cloth covering something.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读C 题设

Sentence.sentence: If the inspector opened the oven door, it would look like bread was baking.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: If you exercise out of doors,your body will learn to breathe more deeply,allowing even more oxygen to get to your muscles and your brain.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: If you have a door to your office, make good use of it.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: In a fire drill, the students should shut the door and leave at once.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 题设

Sentence.sentence: It seemed an unending journey, but even as a six-year-old girl I realized that knowing how to read could open many doors.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: It was bidden in rooms with doors about to be locked.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Just last year, I was conducting a workshop when someone knocked at the classroom door.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Okay, are you familiar with our door-to-door shuttle service?
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: On the first day of my first grade, I stood by the door with butterflies in my stomach.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Out of breath, I swung open the door and got a blast of cold air that instantly cooled me off.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: She left before I could even make it to the door to offer my thanks.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Someone had left a note under their door during the night.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Students are provided with a combination for their room door locks upon check-in.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Students are to close kitchen doors after cooking.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 选项

Sentence.sentence: The bus hit a lamp post and it broke the glass on the front door before Harvold managed to bring the bus to a stop.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The office of residence life may change the door lock combination at any time at the expense of the resident if it is found that the student has shared the combination with others.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: The theater audience said good-by as bradford locked the doors for the last time.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: They find that customers make decisions in the first few seconds upon walking in the door, and turn it into a business opportunity.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Two hours later, back at my house, I heard a knock on the door.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The court did suggest that accepting favors in return for opening doors is “distasteful” and “nasty.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: You meet new people every day: the grocery worker, the cab driver, new people at work or the security guard at the door.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: Our manager lives three doors off.
sentences.cn: 我们经理住在隔壁第三家。

sentences.en: He came out through the door.
sentences.cn: 他从出入口处走出来。

phrase.cizu_name: as one door closes, another opens

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)you shouldn't be discouraged by failure, as other opportunities will soon present themselves
jx.jx_cn_mean: (谚)一扇门关闭的同时，另一扇门又打开了；不应该为失败所挫，因为还会有别的机会出现

jx.jx_en_mean: on admission to an event rather than in advance

lj.lj_ly: tickets will be available at the door.
lj.lj_ls: 到要走时还可以买得到票。

phrase.cizu_name: close (或 shut) the door on (或 to)

lj.lj_ly: she had closed the door on ever finding out what he was feeling.

jx.jx_en_mean: from start to finish of a journey

lj.lj_ly: the trip from door to door could take more than four hours.
lj.lj_ls: 全部旅程要四个多小时。

jx.jx_en_mean: visiting all the houses in an area to sell or publicize something

lj.lj_ly: he went from door to door selling insurance policies.
lj.lj_ls: 他挨家挨户地推销保单。
一位逐门逐户推销的推销员。

jx.jx_en_mean: regard someone as responsible for something

lj.lj_ly: the failure is laid at the door of the government.

jx.jx_en_mean: monitoring admission to a building or event

lj.lj_ly: the uniformed commissionaires on the door.

jx.jx_cn_mean: 为…打开大门；为…创造机会

lj.lj_ly: her research has opened the door to a deeper understanding of the subject.
lj.lj_ls: 她的研究为更深入了解这个问题创造了机会。

jx.jx_en_mean: in or into the open air

lj.lj_ly: food tastes even better out of doors.

jx.jx_cn_mean: 职责：在某人的责任范围之内

phrase.cizu_name: close the door on 或 shut the door on

jx.jx_en_mean: To refuse to allow for the possibility of

lj.lj_ly: The secretary of state closed the door on future negotiations.
lj.lj_ls: 国务卿使得即将的谈判无法进行

jx.jx_en_mean: To allow for the possibility of

lj.lj_ly: Let's leave the door open for future stylistic changes.
lj.lj_ls: 我们得考虑到将来改变风格的可能

jx.jx_cn_mean: 撵出：把（某人）赶出某建筑物

jx.jx_en_mean: To terminate the employment of; fire.

entry.def: A door is a piece of wood, glass, or metal, which is moved to open and close the entrance to a building, room, cupboard, or vehicle.

example.ex: I knocked at the front door, but there was no answer...
example.tran: 我敲了敲前门，没有人应。

example.ex: The policeman opened the door and looked in...
example.tran: 警察打开门朝里面看。

entry.def: A door is the space in a wall when a door is open.

example.ex: She looked through the door of the kitchen. Her daughter was at the stove.
example.tran: 她从厨房门口朝里看，发现女儿站在炉子旁。

entry.def: The door is the entrance to a large building such as a shop, hotel, or theatre.
entry.tran: (商店、宾馆、戏院等的)进口，入口

example.ex: He entered Harrods by the main door...
example.tran: 他从正门进入了哈罗德商场。

example.ex: The queues at the door wound around the building.
example.tran: 门口的队伍绕了大楼一圈。

entry.def: Doors is used in expressions such as a few doors down or three doors up to refer to a place that is a particular number of buildings away from where you are.

example.ex: Mrs Cade's house was only a few doors down from her daughter's apartment.
example.tran: 凯德夫人的房子和她女儿的公寓就隔了几户人家。

entry.def: When you answer the door, you go and open the door because a visitor has knocked on it or rung the bell.

example.ex: Carol answered the door as soon as I knocked.
example.tran: 我一敲门，卡萝尔就来开了。

entry.def: If you say that someone gets or does something by the back door or through the back door, you are criticizing them for doing it secretly and unofficially.
entry.tran: 偷偷摸摸地;背地里地;不正当地

example.ex: The government would not allow anyone to sneak in by the back door and seize power by force...
example.tran: 政府不会允许任何人偷偷混进来并用暴力攫取政权。

example.ex: They claim the Government is privatising dentistry through the back door.
example.tran: 他们声称政府正通过不正当的手段将牙医业私有化。

entry.def: If someone closes the door on something, they stop thinking about it or dealing with it.
entry.tran: 不再想;不再做;拒…于门外

example.ex: We never close the door on a successful series.
example.tran: 我们从不把成功的系列节目拒之门外。

entry.def: If people have talks and discussions behind closed doors, they have them in private because they want them to be kept secret.

example.ex: ...decisions taken in secret behind closed doors.
example.tran: 背地里秘密作出的决定

entry.def: If someone goes from door to door or goes door to door, they go along a street calling at each house in turn, for example selling something.

example.ex: They are going from door to door collecting money from civilians.
example.tran: 他们挨家挨户地向百姓收钱。

example.ex: ...a door-to-door salesman...
example.tran: 上门推销员

entry.def: If you talk about a distance or journey from door to door or door to door, you are talking about the distance from the place where the journey starts to the place where it finishes.

example.ex: ...tickets covering the whole journey from door to door...
example.tran: 全程票

example.ex: Flying out on Friday from Gatwick it took seven hours door-to-door.
example.tran: 星期五从盖特威克起飞全程需要 7 个小时。

entry.def: If you say that something helps someone to get their foot in the door or their toe in the door, you mean that it gives them an opportunity to start doing something new, usually in an area that is difficult to succeed in.
entry.tran: （通常指难以成功的领域中）迈向目标的第一步，成功的开端

example.ex: The bondholding may help the firm get its foot in the door to win the business...
example.tran: 债券的持有可能是有助于该公司赢得业务的第一步。

example.ex: The Philips deal also gives Sparc a foot in the door of a new market — consumer electronics.
example.tran: 与飞利浦公司的交易也使斯巴克得以进入一个新市场——消费类电子产品。

entry.def: If someone shuts the door in your face or slams the door in your face, they refuse to talk to you or give you any information.
entry.tran: 拒绝同…谈话;拒绝向…透露信息

example.ex: Did you say anything to him or just shut the door in his face?
example.tran: 你跟他说什么了吗，还是直接给了他个闭门羹？

entry.def: If you lay something at someone'sdoor, you blame them for an unpleasant event or situation.

example.ex: I'm notsure his death can be laid at medicine's door alone...
example.tran: 我不确信他的死亡单单是药物所致。

example.ex: The blame is generally laid at the door of the government.
example.tran: 通常谴责的矛头都会指向政府。

entry.def: If someone or something opens the door to a good new idea or situation, they introduce it or make it possible.
entry.tran: 介绍(新思想或新情况);使…成为可能

example.ex: This book opens the door to some of the most exciting findings in solid-state physics...
example.tran: 这本书介绍了固态物理中一些最激动人心的发现。

example.ex: Researchers are pushing back the frontiers and opening doors to reveal why things happen and how things work.
example.tran: 研究者们拓展了其研究领域，介绍并揭示了事物发生的原因和机理。

entry.def: When you are out of doors, you are not inside a building, but in the open air.

example.ex: The weather was fine enough for working out of doors.
example.tran: 天气太好了，适合户外工作。

entry.def: If you see someone to the door, you go to the door with a visitor when they leave.
If someone shows you the door, they ask you to leave because they are angry with you.

example.ex: Would they forgive and forget — or show him the door?
example.tran: 他们会既往不咎吗——还是会对他下逐客令呢？

means.word_mean: 1. a swinging or sliding barrier that will close the entrance to a room or building or vehicle;

sentences.sentence: "he slammed the door as he left"

means.word_mean: 2. the entrance (the space in a wall) through which you enter or leave a room or building; the space that a door can close;

sentences.sentence: "he stuck his head in the doorway"

means.word_mean: 3. anything providing a means of access (or escape);

sentences.sentence: "we closed the door to Haitian immigrants"

means.word_mean: 4. a structure where people live or work (usually ordered along a street or road);

sentences.sentence: "they live two doors up the street from us"

means.word_mean: 5. a room that is entered via a door;

sentences.sentence: "his office is the third door down the hall on the left"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English duru, dor, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch deur 'door' and German Tür 'door', Tor 'gate'; from an Indo-European root shared by Latin foris 'gate' and Greek thura 'door'

sentences.en: He came out through the door.

sentences.en: Our other branch is just a few doors down the road.

sentences.en: When the Jones left the house for an excursion, they barred the doors and windows up.

sentences.en: Jiangshan city Anshi nonpainted door factory is specialized in producing interior nonpainted door enterprise.

sentences.cn: 先是一家门廊里亮了灯,接着传来“砰”的一下车关门声. 然后谁家电视机又忽闪忽闪地亮了起来.
sentences.en: A porch light came on. A car door slammed. A television flickered.

sentences.cn: 在隔两个门面的一家药店前,站着一名警察,对他笑了笑便转身走开了.
sentences.en: A policeman who stood before a drugstore two doors away laughed and walked down the street.

sentences.cn: 常州斯尔德是一家专业从事移门材料的研发 、 生产和销售的企业.
sentences.en: The company is specialized in developing, manufacture ring and selling sliding door materials.

sentences.cn: 我们驱车挨门逐户拜访, 一家一家地敲门, 准备开始我们的任务.
sentences.en: We drove from house to house , knocking on doors, ready to begin our mission.

sentences.cn: 我们与隔壁一家人保持非常友好的关系.
sentences.en: We keep on very good terms with the people nest door.

sentences.cn: 他经过一家CD店,当他走过的时候,透过店门向里看了一下.
sentences.en: He passed a CD store and looked the front door for a second as he walked.

sentences.cn: 水巷似乎一下子死了,没有一家房门是开着的.
sentences.en: Water alley died at a draught itthat doing not have a door is leaving.

sentences.cn: 比尔敲了一家又一家的门,听到一个又一个“不”.
sentences.en: He knocked on door after door and heard no after no.

sentences.cn: 盈进门控五金制品厂是一家蓬勃发展 、 充满生机的朝阳企业.
sentences.en: YINGJIN door control hardware products factory is a thriving, vibrant sunshine enterprises.

sentences.cn: 只要你进了一家公司的大门, 在内部作横向移动就容易多了.
sentences.en: Once you have your foot in the door, it is easier to move within an organization.

sentences.cn: 有一家酒馆紧挨着商店.
sentences.en: The shop is next door to the tavern.

sentences.cn: 我们住在一家电影院的隔壁.
sentences.en: We live next door to a cinema.

sentences.cn: 我正站在一家酒店门口.
sentences.en: I was standing near a tavern door.

sentences.cn: 现在卖保险的人都是一家一户上门服务的.
sentences.en: Nowadays, people who sell insurance provide services door to door.

sentences.cn: 随后,他便看到了他前面的一家酒吧的门.
sentences.en: Then he saw ahead of him the door of a men's bar.

sentences.cn: 隔壁的一家人从早到晚都要开收音机.
sentences.en: The people next door play their radio from morning till night.

sentences.cn: 我在一家花隔壁工作, 经常买几束打折的花回家.
sentences.en: I work next door to a florist; I often bring home discounted flower bouquets.

sentences.cn: 死亡像一头黑骆驼,在每一家门前下跪.
sentences.en: Death is the black camel that kneels before every door.

sentences.cn: 她走进了一家商店的前门，又从后门离开。
sentences.en: She walked into the front door of a store and exited from the rear.

sentences.cn: 他们接受了另外一家频频换人的公司的聘用。
sentences.en: They have accepted an offer from another firm with a busy revolving door.

sentences.cn: 一般疏散通道均通往楼梯间, 请步入楼梯间并关上防火门.
sentences.en: Generally, fire exit doors lead to staircases. Enter the staircase and close the door behind you.

sentences.cn: 在烟筒壁的右舷有一个通道门.

sentences.cn: 在别人一没注意的时候, 汤姆就走进了黑黑的通道, 打开门并走了进去.
sentences.en: As soon as nobody was looking, Tom went the dark passage, the door and walked in.

sentences.cn: 赫尔, 请打开辅助舱通道门.
sentences.en: Open the pod bay doors, please, Hal.

sentences.cn: 我们进入黑暗的通道, 关上了我们后面的门.
sentences.en: We sprang through into the dark passage, closing the door behind us.

sentences.cn: 中门, 即主要门户 、 主要对外通道.

sentences.cn: 春秋楼即以门楼下的通道为中轴线而建, 乃祭祀关帝之场所.

sentences.cn: 教师只配走服务人员通道,或者绕行后门.
sentences.en: Teachers are told to use the service door or go around the back.

sentences.cn: 电梯门打开,迎面是一条狭窄的通道,在黑暗中一直延伸到一面空白的墙前.
sentences.en: The doors opened to a catwalk that extended over inky darkness to blank wall.

sentences.cn: 我们怎么能够不痛不痒的建议堵死人们做善事的通道 呢 ?
sentences.en: How could we stand here suggesting close the door on any chance of acts of kindness?

sentences.cn: 我走了进去,发现自己正置身于一条黑暗的通道里.
sentences.en: I went through the door and found myself in a dark passageway.

sentences.cn: 不要将天平置于由于门窗打开而形成空气对流的通道上.
sentences.en: Protect the balance from drafts that come from open windows and doors.

sentences.cn: 公路隧道根据防灾和营运时需要,在人行横通道内都有必要设置防火门.
sentences.en: Fire Door is necessary for fire prevention in pedestrian crosswalk.
